page.title: 13W.Lough.Athletics Club.
page.content: {1985}celebrates the tenth anniversary of{Charnwood Athletics Club.}Charnwood has about 500 members,but only approx. 200 turn up each week.We meet on Mondays, Wednesdays and Sunday mornings. Charnwood was founded in 1975 with 12 members. It expanded as the years went by and is now Loughborough's main club. We have produced some good international runners over the years. Charnwood's colours are green and yellow.The emblem is a yellow fox. We use the{University}track which has a curcuit of{400 metres}and also the University pavillion which has changing rooms and a big hall.My dad, Steve Hawkins, is treasurer.He looks after the money.The track is open from 6.30pm until approx.10.00pm.We go as a family group but only my father and I run.Mum takes the money at the door.
